en.title: Pest Control Company Management System | PraticOS
en.description: Stop losing paper work orders and tracking technicians! Pest control management system with real-time tracking, automatic certificates and chemical product control. Get organized in 5 minutes.
en.keywords: pest control software, exterminator management system, pest control work order, pest control app, extermination company software
en.ogTitle: Pest Control Company Management System | PraticOS
en.ogDescription: Stop losing paper work orders! System with technician tracking, automatic certificates and chemical control. Organize your pest control company in 5 minutes.

hero.title: Stop using paper work orders:
hero.subtitle: Ditch the paper forms and know where your technicians are in real-time. Issue certificates automatically, control chemical products and impress corporate clients.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for pest control companies

items.title: Paper work orders that disappear
items.text: Service forms that get wet, torn or lost. Important information that never reaches the office.

items.title: Don't know where the technician is
items.text: Customer calls asking and you don't know if the tech left, is on the way, or already finished.

items.title: Rework due to missing information
items.text: Technician arrives without knowing the history. Does the wrong service or forgets specific areas.

items.title: Manual certificates take forever
items.text: Issuing certificates in Word is slow. Corporate clients demand them and you delay deliveries.

items.title: Disorganized scheduling
items.text: Manual route planning, technicians crossing the city unnecessarily. Wasted fuel and time.

items.title: Demanding corporate clients
items.text: Audits require detailed reports, application history and safety sheets. You can't prove anything.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for daily pest control operations

items.title: Real-time tracking
items.text: Know where each technician is right now.

items.title: Digital WO with photos
items.text: Technician documents everything on their phone. Photos of the location, treated areas, products used.

items.title: Checklist by pest type
items.text: Specific forms for each service: roaches, rats, termites, mosquitoes. Nothing gets forgotten.

items.title: Automatic certificates
items.text: Generate certificates and reports in 2 clicks. Professional PDF with company logo.

items.title: Complete customer history
items.text: See all previous services, products applied, treated areas. Audit coming? Report ready.

items.title: Chemical product control
items.text: Record each application: product, dosage, batch. Meet regulatory requirements easily.

checklist.title: Service
checklist.text: Document each application with photos and technical information. Customer signs digitally and receives the certificate instantly.

items.text: Location photos (before and after)
Type of pest identified
Products applied with dosage
Treated areas mapped
Safety recommendations
Customer digital signature

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools to boost your productivity

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create complete work orders with photos, customer history and products used. All organized.

items.title: Unlimited Photos
items.text: Document treated areas, infestation spots and location condition. Prove the service performed.

items.title: PDF Certificates
items.text: Generate professional certificates and reports automatically. Meet corporate client requirements.

items.title: Financial Control
items.text: See how much you billed, received and have to receive. Complete dashboard.

items.title: Customer Management
items.text: Complete history of each customer: services, products, warranties. Ready for audits.

items.title: Tracking Link
items.text: Customer tracks service status on their phone. Receives certificate automatically.

testimonial.quote: Before I was losing service forms and it took days to issue certificates. Now the technician finishes on their phone and the customer receives everything instantly. We won corporate contracts because of our professionalism.
testimonial.name: Carlos Mendes
testimonial.role: Pest control company owner for 8 years

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: Does it work for any type of pest?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS works for general pest control, termite treatment, rodent control, mosquito control and more. You can create specific checklists for each service type.

items.question: Can I issue certificates through the system?
items.answer: Yes! The system generates certificates and reports in PDF automatically. Just have the technician complete the WO and the document is ready with company logo.

items.question: Will my technicians be able to use it?
items.answer: Absolutely! PraticOS was made to be as simple as using WhatsApp. If you know how to use a phone, you know how to use PraticOS.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team knows the daily routine of pest control companies.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
